des: "The curry powder in this treat adds a deliciously spicy flavor -- as well as disease-fighting curcumin -- to the antioxidant-packed mixed fruit."
ins: In a saucepan, combine juice, cornstarch, curry and sugar. Bring to a simmer. Add blueberries and nectarines; stir until sauce is slightly thickened. Add banana and almonds, then immediately remove from heat. Use warm or cold over angel food cake, ice cream, pancakes or waffles.
